title: A little help needed, unsure about something.
body:
So i got placed on low priority q as a result of my terrible dongle internet. 
The message said "you will be placed in low priority for the next 5 games", my question relates to it, need some {{summoner:13}} 

Am i able to wait for that to 'cool' off or do i need to play 5 games and really really try hard to ensure i have a solid connection :/ (difficult). Also should i be worried about how i am placed in low q, and should i just play norms until i have some stability?

-Regards
Xam

replies.body: Fix your internet first, AND TEST IT. MAKE SURE YOU HAVE FIXED IT, before u play any more games
I haven't read up on it recently, but I'm pretty sure you have to play the 5 games.
